prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Piano, Brass, Guitar, Bass, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Piano, Brass, Guitar, and Bass, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Piano, Brass, Guitar, and Bass, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Piano, Brass, Guitar, and Bass, Organ not included.
